entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
